mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY TE.R ORDER BY TE.RESTFILENUM) AS RNUM ,TE.* FROM (SELECT RSS.*,RF.RESTFILENUM,RF.FILENAME,RF.ORINAME,RGS.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, RS.* FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANTS ORDER BY STARVAL DESC)RS) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 8)RSS LEFT JOIN RESTAURANTSFILE RF ON (RSS.RESTNUM = RF.RESTNUM) LEFT JOIN CATEGORYS CGS ON (RSS.RESTNUM = CGS.RESTNUM) LEFT JOIN RESTCATEGORYS RGS ON (CGS.CATEGORYNUM = RGS.CATEGORYNUM))TE) WHERE RNUM=1

SELECT RESTNUM, RESTNAME,STARVAL,FILENAME FROM (SELECT rownum R,RST.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY TB.RESTNUM ORDER BY TB.RESTFILENUM) AS RNUM,TB.* FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANTS RS LEFT JOIN RESTAURANTSFILE RF ON(RS.RESTNUM = RF.RESTNUM) LEFT JOIN CATEGORYS CGS ON (RS.RESTNUM = CGS.RESTNUM) LEFT JOIN RESTCATEGORYS RGS ON (CGS.CATEGORYNUM = RGS.CATEGORYNUM) LEFT JOIN SEARCHS SES ON (RGS.CATEGORYNUM= SES.CATEGORYNUM) WHERE SES.SEARCH=#{search.search} OR RS.RESTNAME LIKE '%' || #{search.search} || '%')TB) WHERE RNUM=1) RST) WHERE R BETWEEN #{pager.startRow} AND #{pager.lastRow}

SELECT distinct rgs.categoryname FROM RESTAURANTS RS LEFT JOIN RESTAURANTSFILE RF ON(RS.RESTNUM = RF.RESTNUM) LEFT JOIN CATEGORYS CGS ON (RS.RESTNUM = CGS.RESTNUM) LEFT JOIN RESTCATEGORYS RGS ON (CGS.CATEGORYNUM = RGS.CATEGORYNUM) WHERE RS.RESTNUM = #{restNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY TB.RESTNUM ORDER BY TB.RESTFILENUM) AS RNUM,TB.* FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANTS RS LEFT JOIN RESTAURANTSFILE RF ON(RS.RESTNUM = RF.RESTNUM) LEFT JOIN CATEGORYS CGS ON (RS.RESTNUM = CGS.RESTNUM) LEFT JOIN RESTCATEGORYS RGS ON (CGS.CATEGORYNUM = RGS.CATEGORYNUM) LEFT JOIN SEARCHS SES ON (RGS.CATEGORYNUM= SES.CATEGORYNUM) WHERE SES.SEARCH=#{search} OR RS.RESTNAME LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%')TB) WHERE RNUM=1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum R, C.* FROM (SELECT * FROM COMMUNITY ORDER BY NUM DESC)C) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum R, S.* FROM (SELECT * FROM COMMUNITY WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{search} ||'%') S) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 10
